overview: In the tropical heat of a coffee plantation in northern Brazil, men's inhibitions seem to melt away as their loins are set ablaze with unbridled lust. See how hired ranch hands are initiated into the world of male sex. Watch these Latin machos as they plow each other's fields and sow each other's seeds. Experience the site of 13 of Brazil's hottest hunks in a volcanic eruption of pure pleasure. Come To Paradise!
title: Paradise Plantation
